page.title: 02GENERAL INTRODUCTION 2
page.content: The shops in and around{Portobello {High Street}make up the{main shopping {centre}in our D block. The centre provides a fairly comprehensive range of convenience and durable goods. However it suffers from traffic congestion and restricted parking. Recently its supremacy has been challenged by the new{Asda hypermarket on the city outskirts. Some 4,500 people work in the area, the main{sources of employment}being the recently built national government offices at Meadowbank, the retail trade and various light industries and warehouses on the{industrial estates at Seafield and Baileyfield. Extensive areas of{railway land}are also a feature of the area, including the large container depot at Portobello and the service depot at Craigentinny.
